intro: Psychotria megalosperma, commonly known as the giant seed psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its dense, evergreen foliage and clusters of small, white flowers. Its fruit is a capsule that contains numerous tiny seeds, which are dispersed by wind. Psychotria megalosperma is often found in humid, shaded environments within rainforests.
